user_input:
Modify the DHEM model. 
 o Get the datafile attribute for the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level.
 o Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level by setting all values that aren't 0 to 999. Copy the H2\Gas.
 o Add a scenario called unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities
 o Add a max flow property to each object in the H2 inteconnection and H2 Internal bottleneck categories in the gas pipeline class, with the datafile and scenario created in the previous step
 o Clone the model "DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995" and add the new scenario. Call the model “DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline”
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operations on the DHEM model based on the user input and PLEXOS model modification requirements.

tasks.description: Retrieve the datafile attribute for the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select the most appropriate {entity_type} from the following list.

function_args.user_input: set all values that aren't 0 to 999

tasks.description: Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level by copying the H2\Gas file and setting all non-zero values to 999.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select the most appropriate {entity_type} from the following list.

tasks.description: Add a new scenario called 'unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities' to the model.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select the most appropriate {entity_type} from the following list.

tasks.description: Add a max flow property to each object in the H2 inteconnection and H2 Internal bottleneck categories in the gas pipeline class using the modified datafile and the new scenario.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select the most appropriate {entity_type} from the following list.

tasks.description: Clone the model 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995' and add the new scenario, then rename the cloned model to 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select the most appropriate {entity_type} from the following list.
